news.title: Family of farmer Joe Grogan, who died one day after marriage, freeze multi-million-euro estate as widow hosts Ploughing Championships
news.summary: The family of the late Joe Grogan have placed a legal freeze on the administration of his multi-­million-euro estate as a bitter dispute with his widow rages on.

news.title: Man to appear in court charged over death of man (80s) in Co Tipperary
news.summary: A man is to appear before the court charged in connection with the death of a man in his 80s following a serious assault in Co Tipperary last week.

news.title: Race to the Áras: Gareth Sheridan wins Kerry County Council nomination in bid for presidency
news.summary: Independent candidates are continuing their pitches to local councillors throughout today in a bid to secure the backing of four councils needed to get their name on the ballot.

news.title: Eamonn Sweeney: Harry Maguire and Luke Shaw sum up the many shortcomings of Ruben Amorim’s damned United
news.summary: The great symbols of Manchester United’s descent into mediocrity are not Marcus Rashford, Antony and Jadon Sancho but Luke Shaw and Harry Maguire.

news.title: Fionnán Sheahan: Jack of all trades – Busy Chambers prioritises parish-pump tour and a Jim Gavin win over the Budget
news.summary: Jack Chambers stood in the community garden and sunroom in the village of Kilmeedy in west Limerick taking in the vista. The minister was on a tour of the south-west for the day last Wednesday.

news.title: Sinéad Kissane: Ireland need depth on and off the pitch – but they have laid a solid foundation in this World Cup
news.summary: Scott Bemand's plan for the squad had the 2029 World Cup in Australia at the top of it. That was his initial north star for this team. It looked like a classic example of moving the goalposts.

news.title: Michael Houghton: ‘When you have a mortgage on a buy-to-let property, as we do, positive cash flow is rare’
news.summary: I dropped a friend home one evening after a late night out. He had just returned from the US and was back living in Ireland. He was renting while waiting for his new house to be built. It was a very nice house, in a good neighbourhood in Limerick.

news.title: ‘To this day, I believe the baby we lost was sent to warn me I had bowel cancer’
news.summary: A Dublin mother said she believes a baby she miscarried was sent to save her.

news.title: ‘Richard was totally let down by the system, it’s just a case of get them in and get them out’
news.summary: They say that the greatest sadness in life is a parent outliving their children. It’s a pain that Wexford woman Joan Kelly knows all too well.

news.title: Amy Donohoe: From Charlie Kirk division to ICE paranoia – what it’s like for Irish people living in Donald Trump’s America
news.summary: Moving to the US this year was always going to come with its hazards.
